replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
* Install Risugami's mod loader. Link:  http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... gamis-mods-updates/
* Download the package below and extract it.
* Open .minecraft\bin folder.
* Open the "minecraft.jar" file with a archive manager program(7 zip, winrar etc).
* Drag the extracted files to the archive and overwrite if needed.
* If you didn't already, delete the META-INF folder from the archive.

看安裝說明... 它要先裝上ModLoader, 然後再把那些 .class 文件丟進 minecraft.jar 裡... META-INF是一定要刪的... 

ModLoader 在MOD區置頂帖找得到
